for i in range(int(input())):
    (q, p) = map(float, input().split())
    total = q * p
    print(total * 0.9 if q > 1000 else total)

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    (q, p) = map(float, input().split())
    amt = q * p
    if q > 1000:
        amt = amt - amt * 0.1
    print(amt)

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    (q, p) = map(float, input().split())
    amt = q * p
    if q > 1000:
        amt = amt - amt * 0.1
    print(amt)

r = int(input())
for i in range(r):
    (x, y) = map(int, input().split())
    d = 0
    if x > 1000:
        d = 10 / 100 * (x * y)
    print(float(x * y - d))

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (q, p) = map(float, input().split())
    amount = q * p
    if q > 1000:
        amount = amount - amount * 0.1
    print(amount)

n = int(input())
for i in range(0, n):
    (q, p) = map(int, input().split())
    if q <= 1000:
        a = q * p
        print('{:.6f}'.format(a))
    else:
        b = 10 / 100 * q
        c = q - b
        d = c * p
        print('{:.6f}'.format(d))

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    X = input()
    x = X.split()
    i = 0
    z = float(x[i]) * float(x[i + 1])
    if int(x[i]) > 1000:
        y = z / 100 * 10
        z = z - y
    print('%.6f' % z)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (q, p) = map(float, input().split())
    t = q * p
    print(t * 0.9 if q > 1000 else t)

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (q, p) = map(int, input().split())
    total = q * p
    print(total * 0.9) if q > 1000 else print(total)
